@graph.name: PAS Framework
@graph.description: A copywriting technology that stands for Problem, Agitation, Solution - a simple way to structure copy so that it's clear, concise, and persuasive

@graph.name: Problem
@graph.description: The customer's pain points or issues that need to be addressed

@graph.name: Agitation
@graph.description: The phase where you provide further information to ensure the reader fully understands the problem and its consequences

@graph.name: Solution
@graph.description: The stage where you offer the reader the solution to their problem through your product or service
